name: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken, cook rice separately, layer them with spices, and steam together.

name: Avocado Toast
ingredients: Bread, Avocado, Salt, Pepper, Lemon Juice
instructions: Toast bread, mash avocado with seasoning, spread on toast, and serve.

name: Fruit Salad
instructions: Chop fruits, mix in a bowl, drizzle with honey, and chill before serving.
